alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough; Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 11 at 5:52AM EST until December 14 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Maine, including the following counties, Cumberland and York and New Hampshire, including the following counties, Hillsborough, Rockingham and Strafford. * WHEN...Until 815 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 547 AM EST, Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen with rain ongoing. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Manchester, Nashua, Portland, Derry, Rochester, Merrimack, South Portland, Biddeford, Portsmouth and Westbrook.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
